Original: Oh, that request... I am sorry to say
it is yet another search for the
hapless Raht.
[Page]
It seems that he rushed out again upon
hearing that the Sacred Mountains are
open... His father is the client.
[Page]
As usual, you may ask the client
himself for further details. I shall
await your swift return.

Original: Well done, everyone, in successfully
finding Raht.
[Page]
At first, I thought him a nuisance,
but now... I feel a strange attachment
to him.
[Page]
Is the same true for you? If so, we
may all be fools charmed by his
misadventures.

Original: As you proceed through the frigid
mountains, you discover a wrecked
skyship in the snowy plains.
[Page]
Nearby is a collapsed man. When he
notices you, he greets you with a
thumbs up.
[Page]
There is no mistaking it now... This
is Raht, the missing explorer you
were charged with finding.
Translation: As you proceed through the frigid

[Page]

thumbs up.
[Page]

were charged with finding.

Original: You quickly land and rush to his side.
Raht smiles powerlessly and speaks
in a halting voice.
[Page]
"I'm sorry I keep putting you in this
situation. Even I know I'm not cut
out to be an explorer. But...
[Page]
"I don't have much time left..."
He rolls back his sleeve to show the
horrendous bruises covering his arm.
[Page]
"It's a mysterious, rare disease. The
bruises will eventually cover my whole
body, and then... There's no cure.
[Page]
"That's why while I could still move--
even though I'm hurt and can't now--
I wanted to see the world.
[Page]
"Please don't tell my family about
any of this. Oh, but do tell them
I'm here!"
[Page]
As he cracks a weak joke, you realize
that he has returned to his usual
feckless, friendly manner.
[Page]
You decide to board your skyship in
order to return to Tharsis and report
Raht's location to his father.

to see him rescued.
